Text: RE BetAlright Ill take the bet Ill have to scrounge around to find buck though You know youre stealing money from my severance I may need that to eat on by the end of the week If you say the line is that works for me CU is on a roleits time for Simms to go down If you steal my money youll have to buy me a beer Original Message From Bass Eric Sent Tuesday November AM To Hatten Micah Subject Bet Since you never gave me the for the last time we bet on CUTexas I figured I would give you the chance to go double or nothing on the second round I think the line is Texas Let me know
